![Collapse](https://profiles.viictr.org/Profile/Modules/PropertyList/images/minusSign.gif)
Overview  

![Collapse](https://profiles.viictr.org/Profile/Modules/PropertyList/images/minusSign.gif)
overview

As a provider of medical subspecialty care for adolescents and young adults at
Texas Children’s Hospital and the BCM Teen Health Clinics, Dr. Ricondo strives
to create safe and affirming spaces that empower youth to embrace their
individuality and become advocates of their own health with the help of an
interdisciplinary team and familial support. Dr. Ricondo’s clinical and
research interests include the care of transgender and gender diverse youth,
as well as management of eating disorders, gynecological issues, and sexual
and reproductive health needs.
